name: testPreviewDescriptionFromConfigurationPage
description: Verification of presence Preview of description for Organization Folder Project from the Configuration page
descriptionHtml: Verification of presence Preview of description for Organization Folder Project from the Configuration page

testStage.description: Verification of presence Preview of description for Organization Folder Project from the Configuration page

steps.name: Click on 'New Item' in the side menu
Click 'Save' button on the BaseConfigPage page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
Click on the 'Configure' button on side menu
Click on the 'Configure' Button on the Base Job Page
Logout from instance http://localhost:8081/
